name: Superstar Single Mom and Kids
description:
Play Superstar Single Mom &Kids and experience all the virtual family activities of virtual mom & in this home adventure. Being Single mom is a very tough job. Mom has to fulfil the responsibilities of real mom. So be ready for fun filled family home adventure time with new born baby boy and pretty young girl who goes to High School.

Mom’s daily household activities involve cooking yummy food, doing laundry, cleaning house, doing kids shopping, visiting doctor, gardening & playing with kids. Family mom will manage all the housekeeping household activities alone.

Features:

• Be an incredible mom & fulfil all virtual family activities!
• Best 3D graphics & animations!
• Shopping & real cooking in best virtual sim 2018!
